Text: Gas Contract RequestDebra I faxed you part the contract I have on file If you look at the Commitment Section it will give you the legal description It appears that there has been at least a price amendment The gas purchase statement for Duke Field Services LP indicates the contract number as BEN C My phone and fax information is below Please call if you need any more information Tenzy Rambo Bradley Marketing Coordinator University Lands Acct Office Phone Fax St Address W Colorado Suite Austin Tx Mailing Address PO Box Austin Tx
